article_title: More Jobs, Higher Incomes & 70 Million Freed From Illegal Taxes

article_metadata.description: State-by-state figures show the winners under King v. Burwell vastly outnumber those who would lose an illegal subsidy--to which, by definition, they were never entitled in the first place. There will be even more winners if Congress responds by repealing ObamaCare.
article_metadata.author: Michael F. Cannon

og.description: State-by-state figures show the winners under King v. Burwell vastly outnumber those who would lose an illegal subsidy--to which, by definition, they were never entitled in the first place. There will be even more winners if Congress responds by repealing ObamaCare.
og.title: Benefits Of 'King v. Burwell': More Jobs, Higher Incomes & 70 Million Freed From Illegal Taxes
